title: TheChin0s
author: TheChin0s
content: I offer free acceleration service for screwed up BTC transactionsJust leave me your BTC transaction and I'll be happy to help you, I have a paid service and I can help you at no costI offer this due to high demand for transactions that average 400k without confirming

comments.author: stadus
comments.body: This is a great help, especially at the current situation where transaction fees are very high. I had plans to transact, but I didn't push through because of the current state.I have found someone who offered this kind of service in the past, but it's not active anymore.Free BTC Acceleration

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: There's demand for this right now because of network congestion but there are users who don't want to expose their transactions, might as well leave your Telegram handle or allow private communication to send the transaction.Its better to also leave your addresses for tipping not only Bitcoin but other Coins/tokens And also leave a disclaimer because if it's a free accelerator there's no guarantee of time of confirmation, people might blame you if they are not getting a good result.

comments.author: TheChin0s
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on May 07, 2023, 11:34:03 PMThere's demand for this right now because of network congestion but there are users who don't want to expose their transactions, might as well leave your Telegram handle or allow private communication to send the transaction.Its better to also leave your addresses for tipping not only Bitcoin but other Coins/tokens And also leave a disclaimer because if it's a free accelerator there's no guarantee of time of confirmation, people might blame you if they are not getting a good result.Friend I just want to offer my service without change to anythingLeave your transactions here!!

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Let's see if you can get this transaction to confirm.92110a375867e72c063733940799878c2a33890c26250b06ca927518e585326f#0Been over 2 days now, network probably going to drop it soon.

comments.author: ChuckBuck
comments.body: even Binance is shutting down their BTC withdrawal system. Your service provided at this time is truly amazing! Quote from: TheChin0s on May 08, 2023, 12:07:30 AMFriend I just want to offer my service without change to anythingI think you should leave your wallet address here, if your service works well, at some point someone will want to donate to you, including about fee-for-service, you should specify about it's for everyone to use

comments.author: TheChin0s
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on May 08, 2023, 01:11:58 AMLet's see if you can get this transaction to confirm.92110a375867e72c063733940799878c2a33890c26250b06ca927518e585326f#0Been over 2 days now, network probably going to drop it soon.Excuse me , but say wrong hash #0?

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: TheChin0s on May 08, 2023, 02:45:14 AMQuote from: yahoo62278 on May 08, 2023, 01:11:58 AMLet's see if you can get this transaction to confirm.92110a375867e72c063733940799878c2a33890c26250b06ca927518e585326f#0Been over 2 days now, network probably going to drop it soon.Excuse me , but say wrong hash #0?Just remove the #0. For some reason when it copies from the page it adds that. Not a big deal if you cannot get the transaction to confirm. I'll keep an eye out and let you know if it does confirm.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: I'm surprised to see many members are trust this guy when he had asked a non collateral loan, a part of alt accounts, and asking someone to accelerate his transaction. It's true you guys don't need to pay anything to him since he's not ask any fee and there's nothing wrong to try, right? but don't put a big hope about it due to his suspicious activities.I'd say @OP is trying to built his reputation and trust by offering a free service.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: Plaguedeath on May 08, 2023, 03:38:21 AMI'm surprised to see many members are trust this guy when he had asked a non collateral loan, a part of alt accounts, and asking someone to accelerate his transaction. It's true you guys don't need to pay anything to him since he's not ask any fee and there's nothing wrong to try, right? but don't put a big hope about it due to his suspicious activities.I'd say @OP is trying to built his reputation and trust by offering a free service.I lose nothing by giving him a shot to confirm a transaction tion and he gains nothing if it confirms.

comments.author: TheChin0s
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on May 08, 2023, 01:11:58 AMLet's see if you can get this transaction to confirm.92110a375867e72c063733940799878c2a33890c26250b06ca927518e585326f#0Been over 2 days now, network probably going to drop it soon.Accelerated

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Plaguedeath on May 08, 2023, 03:38:21 AMI'm surprised to see many members are trust this guy when he had asked a non collateral loan, a part of alt accounts, and asking someone to accelerate his transaction. It's true you guys don't need to pay anything to him since he's not ask any fee and there's nothing wrong to try, right? but don't put a big hope about it due to his suspicious activities.I'd say @OP is trying to built his reputation and trust by offering a free service.Why not if he can really offer to accelerate the transaction, it's a free service for people having issues with their transactions, he's not asking for a tip either, and he did not post his addresses.Not because he has bad feedback he cannot offer something useful to the community when we need it, I don't have a transaction to confirm but maybe later I will try his service.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: OP seems to have failed to "accelerate" transaction (for now), and somehow I doubt that it will happen because too much time has passed since his post. I also tried with the only free accelerator that works, but although the transaction fee is sufficient, the problem is in the size of the transaction.

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: Quote from: TheChin0s on May 07, 2023, 11:09:57 PMI offer free acceleration service for screwed up BTC transactionsJust leave me your BTC transaction and I'll be happy to help you, I have a paid service and I can help you at no costI offer this due to high demand for transactions that average 400k without confirmingCan you push this for me ? Its a 14sat/vB transaction. Cant accelerate it through viaBTC's free accelerator from here. It will probably not get confirmed by simple re-broadcasting. Lets see if you can do it.txid: 5493ce06c620636cf4ca0a94cb4512cd215c51f8a0cd4b8cde6665106cfc209b

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Let's see if you can push this transaction 5f7fdd9030ec3139ccf354437defa7112895687687a726c08ff6ce371531aec3It has 50.755 sat/vByte and probably miners wont prioritize such small amount of fee compared to recent transactions which has 50$ fees.

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Quote from: PX-Z on May 08, 2023, 03:54:19 PMLet's see if you can push this transaction 5f7fdd9030ec3139ccf354437defa7112895687687a726c08ff6ce371531aec3It has 50.755 sat/vByte and probably miners wont prioritize such small amount of fee compared to recent transactions which has 50$ fees.I got it submitted to ViaBTC, luckily I was reading this topic at around '58.LE:Seems like there is no real rush, 2 full minutes after the hour and only 5 out of the 100 free spots were taken.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: TheChin0s on May 07, 2023, 11:09:57 PMJust leave me your BTC transaction and I'll be happy to help you, I have a paid service and I can help you at no costWhat is your paid service website link?I think you are going to have a lot of customers for free acceleration if bitcoin mempool continues with this trend.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: stompix on May 08, 2023, 04:01:24 PMI got it submitted to ViaBTC, luckily I was reading this topic at around '58.LE:Seems like there is no real rush, 2 full minutes after the hour and only 5 out of the 100 free spots were taken.Thanks man, i didn't thought viabtc will work since it does not fit the required tx fee in viabtc to proceed the free accelerator but it looks like i'm wrong. Thanks again!

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Please accelerate the Yomix campaign transaction: 20bd6b973d7b6ba33e6894280ea6633e3ceaef7777dd470bee41e6142ab8b9cbI cannot CPFP it without wiping out my entire weekly payment in fees.
